description:
Naruto and his team begin the first exam, a written test. The exam proctor is a special jonin (upper rank ninja) named Ibiki Morino, who is an infamous expert in interrogation.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Deta Toko Shoubu! Funbari Dokoro no 10 Momme
Die zehnte Frage: Alles oder Nichts?
The Tenth Question: All or Nothing!
จะสู้หรือจะถอย
出たとこ勝負! 踏ん張りどころの10問目
